duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business-to-business sales efforts.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, managing multiple touch points and driving outcomes through effective follow-up.
Engage in face-to-face sales meetings, networking, and portfolio building to promote and sell products and services.
Maintain client relationships and drive future revenue growth through compelling and persistent communication.
Participate in critical business discussions to address business owners' needs and utilize custom CRM platform for client acquisition.
Participate in leadership and account executive responsibilities to secure renewals and maintain a top position on the sales leaderboard.
Engage in training and development opportunities to enhance sales performance and take advantage of earning potential.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (MBA preferred)
